title: Former New York Police Officer Convicted in Freezing Death of Son
description: The Long Island jury convicted Michael Valva of second-degree murder for killing his 8-year-old son, Thomas, who contracted hypothermia when he was made to stay in a freezing garage.
dc:creator: Chelsia Rose Marcius
media:description: Michael Valva, seen in a 2020 photo, was found guilty of second-degree murder and four counts of child endangerment.
